set.name: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Water creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature in any way except by summoning, you may return that creature to their hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When this creature attacks, this creature may get +7000 power until the end of that attack. If you do, destroy this creature after that attack. ■ When this card leaves, untap the creature underneath it.

Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best!! Duema Fest Pack: The Rise of Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When this creature is destroyed, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone. If the other is a creature, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard. {SASAGALE} 2 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)
